justification: "Individuals' general tendency to engage in distancing to regulate negative emotions was measured using the single-factor Temporal Distancing Questionnaire, developed by Bruehlman-Senecal et al. (2016)."
"Dispositional fear was measured using the Penn State Worry Questionnaire (PSWQ; Meyer et al., 1990)."
"We measured trait anger using the State-Trait Anger Expression Inventory (STAXI-II; Spielberger, 1999)."

measured_by: Cancer Problem framing task / Plant Problem framing task / Shareholding Problem framing task
justification: "Participants were presented with three different framing problems…the Cancer Problem, Plant Problem, and the Shareholding Problem…For each participant, risk preference was measured three times."
"Trait fear was measured using the Fear Survey Schedule-II (Geer, 1965; Bernstein & Allen, 1969)."

measured_by: State-Trait Anger Expression Inventory (STAXI-II) / Lerner & Keltner 10-item Anger Scale
justification: "We used two complementary measures of trait anger: the State-Trait Anger Expression Inventory (STAXI-II) and Lerner and Keltner's (2001) 10-item anger scale. We combined the two measures to form one single index of trait anger."

measured_by: Adapted Lerner shortened optimistic risk estimation scale
justification: "Risk estimation was measured with an adapted version of Lerner's shortened optimistic risk estimation scale (Lerner & Keltner, 2001; Winterich et al., 2010)."
